scripts.install:all: npm run install:public && npm run install:functions && npm run install:scripts
scripts.update:all: npm run update:public && npm run update:functions && npm run update:scripts
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf .firebase *.log ios-libraries/lib && npm run clean:public && npm run clean:functions && npm run clean:scripts
scripts.build:all: npm run build:public && npm run build:functions
scripts.build:public: npm run build -C public && npm run save-public-assets && mv public/build/index.html functions/public.html
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all && npm run update:all && npm run build:all
scripts.deploy-only-hosting: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P default --only hosting,functions:app && npm run postdeploy
scripts.deploy-except-hosting: npm run predeploy && firebase deploy -P default --except hosting && npm run postdeploy
